analysis.key_quote: I am concerned that the proposed “Schedule Policy/Career” (SP/C) goes too far in allowing nonpartisan policy-involved staff to be dismissed for reasons other than competence and performance.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the erosion of civil service protections and the potential for politicization of federal employees, emphasizing the importance of loyalty to the Constitution over political allegiance. This aligns with opposition to the proposed rule.
